channel.title: Explaining a code

item.title: Explaining a code
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

pEmote = 0x554; [b]mining[0] = 1;[/b] [b]mining[1] = 1;[/b] [b] if (misc.random(2) == 1) { mining[2] = 70;[/b] } else { mining[2] = 71; } mining[4] = 436; break;

what does mining[0], mining[1] change and do in this code. Also, i need help understanding the if (misc.random(2) == 1) { Does that mean that it will randomly switch between mining[2] - 70 and mining[2] = 71?

Read full topic
